20 Relawan Kemenku Ajarkan Anak SDN Ngaglik 2 Soal Pajak
04 Nov 2019, 13:24 by Roy Mastur


20 Relawan Kemenku Ajarkan Anak SDN Ngaglik 2 Soal Pajak

KBRN, Batu: Sebanyak 22 orang relawan Direktorat Jendral Pajak (DJP) Kementrian Keuangan (Kemenku), Senin (4/11/2019) pagi secara serentak memberikan pemahaman dan sosialisasi terkait pajak kepada siswa kelas IV, V dan VI  di di SDN Ngaglik  02, Kota Batu, Jawa Timur.
Dalam rangka memperingati hari Oeang ke 73 itu, DJB Kemenku juga memberikan pemahaman di 13 SDN Malang Raya yang meliputi Kota Batu, Kabupaten Malang dan Kota Malang. Sementara di Malang Raya  sendiri terdapat sebanyak 220 relawan, sedang di seluruh Indonesia sekitar 3700 relawan yang tersebar di 29 Propinsi 60 Kota dan Kabupaten.  
Kepala Kantor Wilayah (Kanwil) Direktorat Jendral Pajak (DJP) Jawa Barat I, Neilmaldrin Noor saat ditemui usai mengajar materi pelajaran Pajak di SDN Ngaglik 02 Batu mengatakan program mengajar soal pajak  pada anak SD itu diharapkan mereka mengenal fungsi, tujuan dan arti penting pajak.
“Kemenkeu mengajar 4 bertema Berbagi pada Anak Bangsa, Menginspirasi hingga Penjuru Negeri Menyambut Kemeriahan Hari Oeang RI 2019. Hal ini diharapkan mereka mempunyai satu pemikiran suatu pengetahuan satu ajaran kepedulian terkait dengan hal-hal urusan bangsa dan Negara,” kata Neilmaldrin Noor.
Selain itu, lanjut dia, juga diharapkan mereka nantinya akan punya satu kebanggaan satu keinginan untuk mereka mempunyai cita-cita yang luhur apapun cita-citanya tetapi suatu cita-cita yang luhur tersebut dapat membanggakan, tidak hanya kepada orang tuanya tetapi untuk bangsa dan tanah air .
Menurutnya, pengenalan terkait pajak, Kemenku mengajar di 14 SD di Malang Raya yakni SDN Percobaan 1, SDN Kesatrian 1, SDN Tunjungsekar 5, SDN Pandanwangi 2, SDN Madyopuro 3, SDN Kebonsari 2, SDN Purwodadi 4, SDN Sukoharjo 1, SDN Pagentan 1, SDN Pagentan 5, SDN Banjararum 2, SDN Sisir 1, SDN Sisir 3 dan SDN Ngaglik 2.
Sementara itu menyikapi terkait soal pengajaran dari kemenku terkait mengajar 4 bertema Berbagi pada Anak Bangsa, Menginspirasi hingga Penjuru Negeri Menyambut Kemeriahan Hari Oeang RI 2019. Nur Syamsul Ma’arif Kepala SDN Ngaglik 02 kota  Batu,  menyambut positif, karena siswa mendapat ilmu baru yang belum pernah dimilikinya.
“Terkait dengan kementrian keuangan dengan 4 thema ini, kami sangat memberikan penghargaan, respon yang bagus kepada tim dari Kemenku, dan trimakasih sekolah kami terpilih sebagai kegiatan mengajar di SD kami,” jelasnya.
Selain itu kehadiran mereka, kata dia juga memberikan ilmu tentang ketatanegaraan, perpajakan dan keuangan, sehingga murid SD telah diajarkan itu dan memiliki ilmu baru yang inovatif dan kreatif.

20 Ministry of Religion Volunteers Teach SDN Ngaglik Children 2 Tax Problems
Nov 04 2019, 13:24 by Roy Mastur


20 Ministry of Religion Volunteers Teach SDN Ngaglik Children 2 Tax Problems

KBRN, Batu: A total of 22 volunteers from the Directorate General of Tax (DJP) of the Ministry of Finance (Kemenku), Monday (11/4/2019) morning, simultaneously gave understanding and socialization related to tax to students of class IV, V and VI at SDN Ngaglik 02 , Kota Batu, East Java.
In commemoration of the 73rd Oeang day, DJB Kemenku also gave an understanding in 13 Malang Raya State Elementary Schools which included Batu City, Malang Regency and Malang City. While in Malang alone there are 220 volunteers, while in Indonesia there are around 3700 volunteers spread across 29 Provinces, 60 Cities and Regencies.
Head of the Regional Office (Kanwil) of the Directorate General of Tax (DJP) of West Java I, Neilmaldrin Noor when met after teaching Tax subject material at SDN Ngaglik 02 Batu said that the program of teaching about taxes to elementary school children was expected that they were familiar with the function, purpose and significance of taxes.
"The Ministry of Finance teaches 4 themed Sharing to the Nation's Children, Inspiring to the Nation Welcoming the Excitement of the Republic of Indonesia 2019 Day. It is hoped that they will have a thought of knowledge of one concern teaching related to matters of national and state affairs," said Neilmaldrin Noor.
In addition, he continued, it was also hoped that they would later have a pride of a desire for them to have lofty ideals whatever their ideals but a lofty ideals that could boast, not only to their parents but to the nation and the motherland .
According to him, an introduction to tax related, Kemenku taught at 14 elementary schools in Malang, namely SDN Experiment 1, SDN Kesatrian 1, SDN Tunjungsekar 5, SDN Pandanwangi 2, SDN Madyopuro 3, SDN Kebonsari 2, SDN Purwodadi 4, SDN Sukoharjo 1, SDN Pagentan 1 , SDN Pagentan 5, SDN Banjararum 2, SDN Sisir 1, SDN Sisir 3 and SDN Ngaglik 2.
Meanwhile addressing the matter of teaching from the ministry related to teaching 4 themed Sharing the Nation, Inspiring to the Nation Welcoming the Excitement of the 2019 RI Oeang Day. Nur Syamsul Ma'arif Head of Ngaglik 02 Elementary School in Batu, welcomed positively, because students received new knowledge that had not yet been ever had.
"Related to the finance ministry with these 4 themes, we really give awards, good responses to the team from Kemenku, and thank you our school was chosen as a teaching activity in our elementary school," he explained.
In addition to their presence, he said he also provided knowledge about state administration, taxation and finance, so elementary students had been taught that and had new knowledge that was innovative and creative.
